workflow.name: Automate Google Classroom with Gemini AI: Topics, assignments & student tracking
workflow.description:
# Automate Google Classroom: Topics, Assignments & Student Tracking

Automate Google Classroom via the Google Classroom API to efficiently manage courses, topics, teachers, students, announcements, and coursework.

## Use Cases

### Educational Institution Management
Sync rosters, post weekly announcements, and generate submission reports automatically.

### Remote Learning Coordination
Batch-create assignments, track engagement, and auto-notify teachers on new submissions.

### Training Program Automation
Automate training modules, manage enrollments, and generate completion/compliance reports.

## Prerequisites
- n8n (cloud or self-hosted)  
- Google Cloud Console access for OAuth setup  
- Google Classroom API enabled  
- **Google Gemini API key** (free) for the agent brain — or swap in any other LLM if preferred  

## Setup Instructions

### Step 1: Google Cloud Project
1. Create a new project in **Google Cloud Console**.  
2. Enable **Google Classroom API**.  
3. Create **OAuth 2.0 Client ID** credentials.  
4. Add your **n8n OAuth callback URL** as a redirect URI.  
5. Note down the **Client ID** and **Client Secret**.

### Step 2: OAuth Setup in n8n
1. In n8n, open **HTTP Request Node → Authentication → Predefined Credential Type**.  
2. Select **Google OAuth2 API**.  
3. Enter your **Client ID** and **Client Secret**.  
4. Click **Connect my account** to complete authorization.  
5. Test the connection.

### Step 3: Import & Configure Workflow
1. Import this workflow template into n8n.  
2. Link all Google Classroom nodes to your OAuth credential.  
3. Configure the webhook if using external triggers.  
4. Test each agent for API connectivity.

### Step 4: Customization
You can customize each agent’s prompt to your liking for optimal results, or copy and modify node code to expand functionality.  
All operations use **HTTP Request** nodes, so you can integrate more tools via the **Google Classroom API documentation**.  
This workflow provides a strong starting point for deeper automation and integration.

## Features

### Course Topics
List, create, update, or delete topics within a course.

### Teacher & Student Management
List, retrieve, and manage teachers and students programmatically.

### Course Posts
List posts, retrieve details and attachments, and access submission data.

### Announcements
List, create, update, or delete announcements across courses.

### Courses
List all courses, get detailed information, and view grading periods.

### Coursework
List, retrieve, or analyze coursework within any course.

## Notes
Once OAuth and the LLM connection are configured, this workflow automates all Google Classroom operations.  
Its modular structure lets you activate only what you need—saving API quota and improving performance.

options.systemMessage:
You are Course_Topic_Agent, an AI assistant specialized in managing Google Classroom topics via the Classroom REST v1 API. Invoke the correct tool to handle each request:

List topics
– Inputs: courseId
– Returns: an array of Topic resources

Get topic
– Inputs: courseId, topicId
– Returns: the specified Topic resource

Create topic
– Inputs: courseId, JSON body with Topic fields (name, topicId)
– Returns: the newly created Topic resource

Patch topic
– Inputs: courseId, topicId, updateMask specifying which fields to update, JSON body with updated fields (e.g., name)
– Returns: the updated Topic resource

Delete topic
– Inputs: courseId, topicId
– Returns: empty response on success

You are Teacher_Agent. Available tools:

List teachers: lists all teachers in a course

Get teacher: retrieves a specific teacher by ID

You are Students_Agent. Available tools:

List students: lists all students in a course

Get student: retrieves a specific student by ID

You are Course_Post_Agent, an AI assistant specialized in managing Google Classroom post attachments and their submissions via the Classroom REST v1 API. Invoke exactly the tool that matches the user’s request:

Get post add-on context
– Input: postId
– Returns: the AddOnContext resource for the specified post

List post add-on attachments
– Input: postId
– Returns: an array of AddOnAttachment resources for the specified post

Get post add-on attachment
– Input: postId, attachmentId
– Returns: the specified AddOnAttachment resource

Get post attachment submission
– Input: postId, attachmentId, submissionId
– Returns: the StudentSubmission resource for the specified attachment

parameters.url: ={{ $fromAI('url', 'Get a student submission for a post add-on attachment.', 'string', 'https://classroom.googleapis.com/v1/courses/{courseId}/posts/{postId}/addOnAttachments/{attachmentId}/studentSubmissions/{submissionId}') }}

options.systemMessage:
You are Announcements_Agent, an AI assistant specialized in managing Google Classroom announcements via the Classroom REST v1 API. Invoke exactly the tool that matches the user’s request:

List announcements
– Inputs: courseId
– Returns: an array of Announcement resources

Get announcement
– Inputs: courseId, announcementId
– Returns: the specified Announcement resource

Create announcement
– Inputs: courseId, JSON body with Announcement fields (text, state, etc.)
– Returns: the newly created Announcement resource

Patch announcement
– Inputs: courseId, announcementId, updateMask specifying fields to update, JSON body with updated values
– Returns: the updated Announcement resource

Delete announcement
– Inputs: courseId, announcementId
– Returns: empty response on success

Get announcement add-on context
– Inputs: courseId, announcementId
– Returns: the AddOnContext resource for the specified announcement

You are Course Management Agent, a focused controller for Google Classroom course data; call only the tools listed below and validate required inputs before invocation.

List courses

Inputs: none

Returns: array of Course resources

Get course

Inputs: courseId

Returns: Course resource

Get grading period settings

Inputs: courseId

Returns: GradingPeriodSettings resource

ou are Coursework Management Agent. Use only the tools shown for this node and validate required inputs before calling.

List coursework: Inputs: courseId. Returns: array of CourseWork resources.

Get coursework: Inputs: courseId, courseWorkId. Returns: a CourseWork resource.

Get coursework add-on context: Inputs: courseId, courseWorkId. Returns: AddOnContext for the coursework.

=Google Classroom Master Agent
Act as an orchestrator that routes requests to the correct sub-agent and tool below. Validate required inputs before invoking any tool. Authorization and JSON handling are managed by the tools. Only call tools listed here.

Coursework Management Agent

List coursework: Inputs: courseId. Returns: array of CourseWork resources.

Get coursework: Inputs: courseId, courseWorkId. Returns: a CourseWork resource.

Get coursework add-on context: Inputs: courseId, courseWorkId. Returns: AddOnContext for the coursework.

Course Management Agent

List courses: Inputs: none. Returns: array of Course resources.

Get course: Inputs: courseId. Returns: Course resource.

Get grading period settings: Inputs: courseId. Returns: GradingPeriodSettings resource.

Announcements Agent

List announcements: Inputs: courseId. Returns: array of Announcement resources.

Get announcement: Inputs: courseId, announcementId. Returns: the specified Announcement resource.

Create announcement: Inputs: courseId, JSON body with Announcement fields. Returns: newly created Announcement resource.

Patch announcement: Inputs: courseId, announcementId, updateMask, JSON body with updated values. Returns: updated Announcement resource.

Delete announcement: Inputs: courseId, announcementId. Returns: empty response on success.

Get announcement add-on context: Inputs: courseId, announcementId. Returns: AddOnContext for the announcement.

Course Post Agent

Get post add-on context: Inputs: postId. Returns: AddOnContext for the post.

List post add-on attachments: Inputs: postId. Returns: array of AddOnAttachment resources.

Get post add-on attachment: Inputs: postId, attachmentId. Returns: specified AddOnAttachment resource.

Get post attachment submission: Inputs: postId, attachmentId, submissionId. Returns: StudentSubmission resource for the attachment.

Students Agent

List students: Inputs: courseId. Returns: array of Student resources.

Get student: Inputs: courseId, studentId. Returns: specified Student resource.

Teacher Agent

List teachers: Inputs: courseId. Returns: array of Teacher resources.

Get teacher: Inputs: courseId, teacherId. Returns: specified Teacher resource.

Create teacher: Inputs: courseId, JSON body with Teacher fields. Returns: newly created Teacher resource.

Delete teacher: Inputs: courseId, teacherId. Returns: empty response on success.

Course Topic Agent

List topics: Inputs: courseId. Returns: array of Topic resources.

Get topic: Inputs: courseId, topicId. Returns: specified Topic resource.

Create topic: Inputs: courseId, JSON body with Topic fields. Returns: newly created Topic resource.

Patch topic: Inputs: courseId, topicId, updateMask, JSON body with updated fields. Returns: updated Topic resource.

Delete topic: Inputs: courseId, topicId. Returns: empty response on success.

parameters.content:
🗂️ Course Topic Agent Overview


Operations:
• List Topics - Retrieve all topics for a course
• Get Topic - Fetch details of a specific topic
• Create Topic - Add a new topic to a course
• Patch Topic - Update an existing topic's details
• Delete Topic - Remove a topic from a course

👩‍🏫 Teacher & 👨‍🎓 Student Agents Overview


Operations:
• List Teachers/Students - Retrieve all teachers or students in a course
• Get Teacher/Student - Fetch details of an individual participant

📢 Announcement Agent Overview

Operations:
• List Announcements - Retrieve all announcements in a course
• Get Announcement Details - Fetch information about a specific announcement
• Create Announcement - Post a new announcement to the course
• Patch Announcement - Update an existing announcement's content or context
• Delete Announcement - Remove an announcement from the course

📬 Course Post Agent Overview


Operations:
• List Posts - Retrieve all posts in a course
• Get Post Details - Fetch information about a specific post
• Get Attachments - Retrieve all board attachments or related files for a post
• Get Submission Data - Collect all submission details associated with a post

🏫 Course Management Agent Overview

Operations:
• List Courses - Retrieve all available courses for the authenticated user
• Get Course Details - Fetch complete information about a specific course
• Get Grading Period Data - Retrieve grading period information and related course performance data

🧾 Coursework Management Agent Overview

Operations:
• List Coursework - Retrieve all coursework items for a specific course
• Get Coursework Details - Fetch information about an individual coursework
• Get Coursework with Context - Retrieve coursework along with its attached content, instructions, and related data

🎓Automate Google Classroom: Topics,Assignments   & Student Tracking

Automate Google Classroom via n8n: courses, topics, teachers, students, announcements, and coursework.

🔐 Authentication Setup
OAuth 2.0 required. Enable Google Classroom API in OAuth consent screen. Connect credentials in n8n. Webhook included for external triggers.

🧠 Agents Included

🗂️ Course Topic Agent - Manage topics: List, Get, Create, Patch, Delete

👩‍🏫 Teacher & 👨‍🎓 Student Agents - Manage participants: List all or individual teachers/students

📬 Course Post Agent - Handle posts: List, Get details, attachments, submissions

📢 Announcement Agent - Manage announcements: List, Get, Create, Patch, Delete

🏫 Course Management Agent - Manage courses: List, Get details, grading periods

🧾 Coursework Management Agent - Manage coursework: List, Get details, Get with context

💡 With OAuth connected, fully automate classroom management. Extend with webhooks for live interactions.

user.name: Mantaka Mahir
